English: Cao Cao (155-220), famous statesman and general at the end of Han, noted poet and calligrapher, later warlord, founder and first king of Cao Wei `曹魏~, father of Emperor Cao Pi `曹丕~
Cao Cao (155-220), famous statesman and general at the end of Han, noted poet and calligrapher, later warlord, founder and first king of Cao Wei `曹魏~, father of Emperor Cao Pi `曹丕~
the main villain of novel the Romance of Three Kingdoms `三國演義~|`三~国`演~`义~
